title: EasyUCS ucs system config unified_storage_ports section
description: EasyUCS ucs system config unified_storage_ports section JSON schema

fabric.description: Fabric ID of Unified Storage Port ("A" or "B")

slot_id.description: Slot ID of Unified Storage Port

port_id.description: Port ID of Unified Storage Port

aggr_id.description: Aggregate ID of Unified Storage Port (for Breakout Ports)

user_label.description: User Label of Unified Storage Port

pin_group.description: LAN Pin Group of Unified Storage Port

network_control_policy.description: Network Control Policy of Unified Storage Port

flow_control_policy.description: Flow Control Policy of Unified Storage Port

admin_speed.description: Admin Speed of Unified Storage Port

vlan_port_mode.description: VLAN Port Mode of Unified Storage Port

appliance_vlans.description: VLAN Name(s) assigned to Unified Storage Port

items.description: VLAN Name assigned to Unified Storage Port

native_vlan.description: (Optional) VLAN Name of native VLAN assigned to Unified Storage Port

ethernet_target_endpoint.description: Ethernet Target Endpoint list of Unified Storage Port

items.description: Ethernet Target Endpoint of Unified Storage Port

name.description: Name of Ethernet Target Endpoint of Unified Storage Port

mac_address.description: MAC Address of Ethernet Target Endpoint of Unified Storage Port

vsan.description: VSAN assigned to Unified Storage Port

vsan_fabric.description: Fabric ID of VSAN assigned to Unified Storage Port
